thread.title: KZN crash leaves two people dead
thread.title_full: KZN crash leaves two people dead | News24

author: news24.com
title: KZN crash leaves two people dead
text:
Durban - Two people were killed and four others seriously injured when a light delivery vehicle left the R76 KwaMaphumulo Link Road in the early hours of Thursday morning.
KwaZulu-Natal EMS spokesperson Robert McKenzie said that paramedics had responded to the scene of the accident and found the damaged wreck of the LDV in roadside scrub.
“Reports from the scene indicate that the vehicle had actually left the R76 and pushed into a roadside bush down an embankment. Where it eventually came to rest was nearly 50 metres from the roadway,” he said.
“Medics faced a considerable challenge of darkness and the need to locate all the patients, some of whom were missing after being flung from the wreckage.
